name: Jazzpunk
summary: Jazzpunk is a comedy adventure set in an alternate reality Cold War World, plagued with corporate espionage, CyberCrime, and sentient martinis. Gameplay is inspired by spoof comedy films and cartoons of yesteryear, with a focus on weird gadgets, exotic locales, and open-world style
info:
• 中文名: 爵士朋克
  • 平台: Mac OS
  • 平台: Linux
  • 平台: PC

  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014年2月7日
  • 售价: 14.99$
  • 官方网站: http://www.jazzpunk.net
